meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #855.

td.p: Dennis Brent, a teacher from Huntington Beach, California
Steve Barto, a field marketing representative originally from Niagara Falls, New York
Mike Harris, a physician from Mill Valley, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $10,800)

tr.td: RUSSIAN HISTORY
ROCK RECORDS
SICKNESS & HEALTH
WHITE HOUSE TRIVIA
PERFUME
"B" THERE
